title: Roast cod à la polonaise with asparagus and cauliflower purée
description: Herbs, gherkins, capers and crunchy breadcrumbs combine with grated boiled egg to make a polonaise dressing for cod fillets.
ingredients: 8-12 asparagus spears (medium size), woody ends removed
pomace olive oil or duck fat, for frying
75g/2½oz lilliput capers, drained, dried and deep fried in pomace oil until crisp
4 x 150-200g/5½-7oz cod fillet pin boned, skin removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
